title: New icon
body:
So... riot gave me this icon today (file:///C:/Users/user/Desktop/Screenshot_1.png) . Can someone tell me what it is or what did i do to obtain it? 
Thanks :D

replies.body: I can't see the icon since it's saved on your desktop, but I'm assuming that was one of the Honor Icons that just went out. They were given out based on all of the old Honor stats.
It looks like you are tying to link to something on your desktop and we can't see it.  They have been sending out icons for the old honor system and that is likely what you got.
